title: People Are Just Playing All AD Champs
body:
Top = AD 99% of the time
Mid = Talon, talon, talon
Jungle = Almost always AD
Bot = 100% AD
Support = 50/50 

Hardly anyone is playing AP anymore, making it hard for us AD players when the enemy legit has 2 tanks on their team.

Just last game, my team = ALL AD, no tanks. Enemy team = ALL AD, 2 tanks (poppy and hec). All day today has just been AD vs AD teams, only had one game where we faced a Kat mid, but they lost badly. I dont know if AP items need a buff or what, but its getting annoying.

replies.body:
I love playing against full AD teams because it's the only time I can put the skills acquired in the tutorial to good use. 

({{champion:22}} {{item:3075}} )

Nah, Son! It's all about that 

({{champion:222}} {{item:3110}} )

No one attacks faster than me. No one, I tell you!
From my experience, mid is not strictly AD at all. Also, support isn't even close to 50/50. I'm not sure there are even many "AD" champs. It's either AP or straight tank. Again, from my experience.

If you are having trouble with tanks, try armor pen.  AD receved a buff because Everything AD could do AP did Literally twice as good. I am glad we're seeing more talon, he has been Out of Meta since season 3. You never see a good zed and Yasuo is nearly perma banned dispite the fact most people can't play him at all.
It will be even worse after they ner rylai
